Fix this ugly code!

This page is full of violations of the DRY principle (Don't Repeat Yourself) along with a number of other violations of HTML markup best practices.

Your goal is to refactor the HTML, CSS and JavaScript on this page so that you have a clear separation of concerns between this technologies.

Click here to see suggested refactoring path!

  1. Refactor inline styles.
  2. Refactor duplication that exists in the inline style tags.
  3. Refactor markup to use appropriate html elements.
  4. Refactor styles to eliminate the property duplication.
  5. Refactor javascript to eliminate inline click handler.

While there are number of tools available that can assist in making this refactoring easier I want to challenge you to do this refactor with nothing but your brain and a text editor.
